replies.msg:
*Call for establishment of 8964 Truth Commission*
https://www.usip.org/publications/2011/03/truth-commission-digital-collection
T


What is truth commission?
//A truth commission or truth and reconciliation commission is a commission tasked with discovering and revealing past wrongdoing by a government (or, depending on the circumstances, non-state actors also), in the hope of resolving conflict left over from the past. Truth commissions are, under various names, occasionally set up by states emerging from periods of internal unrest, civil war, or dictatorship.//

美國官方64悼念會
我其中意義深遠
我哋要再諗啲創意突破六四你一條戰線
